name: M&CD
description:
Get in the car and deliver that milk before the coffee gets cold!

Drive at full speed, skid to the limit and arrive before the caffee cools to prepare a magnificent milk coffee.

Features:

  • Too dark to see the road
  • Boob Physics
  • Great history(Not really)
  • Polished driving system
  • Post-processing abuse

Don't miss your chance and play the game that created this sickminded developer for Sushidev Jam 2020!

Not available in english for now
